AT.name: 3D Space Harrier
AT.description: Als einfallsreicher Weltraumkrieger besteht deine Mission darin, das friedvolle Land der Drachen vor bösen Kreaturen zu schützen. Mit Hilfe der Drachen und allen dir bekannten Mitteln und Tricks musst du versuchen, die außerirdischen Invasoren in die Flucht zu schlagen! Neben der neuen 3D-Präsentation lässt sich 3D Space Harrier durch Berühren steuern und verfügt über einen Arcade-Automat-Modus.

AU.name: 3D Space Harrier
AU.description: As a resourceful, extra-terrestrial warrior, your mission is to save the peaceful Land of the Dragons from vicious creatures. Aided by the dragons, you must use every trick in the book and every skill at your command in order to stave off these alien invaders and save the day! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Space Harrier also features touch control functionality and an Arcade Cabinet mode!

BG.name: 3D Space Harrier
BG.description: As a resourceful, extra-terrestrial warrior, your mission is to save the peaceful Land of the Dragons from vicious creatures. Aided by the dragons, you must use every trick in the book and every skill at your command in order to stave off these alien invaders and save the day! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Space Harrier also features touch control functionality and an Arcade Cabinet mode!

BE.name: 3D Space Harrier
BE.description: Incarne un guerrier extraterrestre et anéantis les créatures malfaisantes qui menacent la paisible Terre des dragons. Avec l'aide des dragons, tu dois utiliser tous les stratagèmes et compétences disponibles pour repousser les envahisseurs et sauver le monde ! En plus de sa toute nouvelle présentation en relief, 3D Space Harrier comporte également des commandes tactiles et un mode cabinet d'arcade mobile !

ES.name: 3D Space Harrier
ES.description: Eres un guerrero extraterrestre con muchos recursos y tu misión será salvar la pacífica Tierra de los Dragones de unas malvadas criaturas. Con la ayuda de los dragones, deberás usar todas tus artimañas y habilidades para mantener a raya a estos invasores alienígenas y salvar el mundo. ¡Además de sus nuevos gráficos en 3D, 3D Space Harrier también tiene la función de control táctil y un modo Máquina móvil!

IT.name: 3D Space Harrier
IT.description: Sei un guerriero alieno e ingegnoso e la tua missione è salvare la pacifica Terra dei draghi dall'attacco di creature malvage. Con l'aiuto dei draghi, dovrai usare tutte le tue risorse e le tue abilità per scacciare gli invasori alieni! Oltre ad essere completamente in 3D, 3D Space Harrier include i comandi touch e la modalità Cabinato arcade!

Aided by the dragons, you must use every trick in the book and every skill at your command in order to stave off these alien invaders and save the day! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Space Harrier also features touch control functionality and an Arcade Cabinet mode!

NL.name: 3D Space Harrier
NL.description: Als vindingrijke, buitenaardse krijger is het je missie om het vredige Land of the Dragons uit de greep van snode wezens te redden. Terwijl je hulp krijgt van de draken, moet je al je trucs en vaardigheden aanwenden om deze buitenaardse indringers te verjagen en uit te groeien tot de held van de dag! 3D Space Harrier kent niet alleen volledig nieuwe 3D-beelden, maar is ook met aanrakingen te besturen en voorzien van een Arcade Cabinet-stand!

NZ.name: 3D Space Harrier
NZ.description: As a resourceful, extra-terrestrial warrior, your mission is to save the peaceful Land of the Dragons from vicious creatures. Aided by the dragons, you must use every trick in the book and every skill at your command in order to stave off these alien invaders and save the day! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Space Harrier also features touch control functionality and an Arcade Cabinet mode!

PL.name: 3D Space Harrier
PL.description: As a resourceful, extra-terrestrial warrior, your mission is to save the peaceful Land of the Dragons from vicious creatures. Aided by the dragons, you must use every trick in the book and every skill at your command in order to stave off these alien invaders and save the day! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Space Harrier also features touch control functionality and an Arcade Cabinet mode!

PT.name: 3D Space Harrier
PT.description: Na pele de um guerreiro extraterrestre cheio de recursos, salva a pacífica Land of the Dragons de várias criaturas perigosas. Com a ajuda dos dragões, usa todos os teus truques e habilidades para deter os invasores alienígenas e salvar o dia! Para além da sua nova apresentação 3D, o Space Harrier 3D também inclui a funcionalidade de controlos táteis e um modo Arcade Cabinet (Máquina das Arcadas)!

RU.name: 3D Space Harrier
RU.description: Вы - находчивый инопланетный воин, и ваша задача - спасти безмятежную Страну драконов от неких агрессивных существ. Заручившись помощью драконов, используйте все собственные умения, а также любые доступные средства для того, чтобы прогнать злых пришельцев и восстановить мир. 3D-версия Space Harrier получила не только полностью трехмерный вид, но и сенсорное управление, а также режим игрового автомата!
